name: Egg-Celsior!
description:
A tiny game prototype for the 45th weekly game jam with the theme "Hatch an Egg." Made in about 10-15 hours, over 2 days.

Protect the egg from the snakes. Hatch a dragon.

Resources

  • Visuals
    • Dragons: https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-enemies-11-dragons
    • Animated snake: https://opengameart.org/content/animated-snake
    • LPC Terrain: https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-terrains
  • Music
    • "Shamanistic" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
    • "Firesong" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
  • SFX from http://www.freesfx.co.uk
    • Loud Ice Crack from Temperature Drop 
    •  Horror Splat with Juicy Squish
